p: 9. In lines 208-209, the authors state “…. and influenza was the cause of approximately one in every 100 deaths”. This is not explicit in the results section but I suppose that this is based on dividing the total mean annual all-cause deaths by the mean annual influenza-associated deaths. Could the authors try to make this more explicit in the text? This further highlights why you should not include the 2009 pandemic data in your EMRs models.
